mapper.sql: proj_plan_id AS projPlanId, project_id AS projectId, business_id AS businessId, original_business_id AS originalBusinessId, repayment_batch_id AS repaymentBatchId, plan_id AS planId, borrow_money AS borrowMoney, borrow_rate AS borrowRate, borrow_rate_unit AS borrowRateUnit, on_line_over_due_rate AS onLineOverDueRate, on_line_over_due_rate_unit AS onLineOverDueRateUnit, off_line_out_over_due_rate AS offLineOutOverDueRate, off_line_out_over_due_rate_unit AS offLineOutOverDueRateUnit, off_line_in_over_due_rate AS offLineInOverDueRate, off_line_in_over_due_rate_unit AS offLineInOverDueRateUnit, borrow_limit AS borrowLimit, borrow_limit_unit AS borrowLimitUnit, plan_status AS planStatus, is_defer AS isDefer, active, creat_sys_type AS creatSysType, plate_type AS plateType, create_time AS createTime, create_user AS createUser, update_time AS updateTime, update_user AS updateUser, query_full_success_date AS queryFullSuccessDate
mapper.select: SELECT if(pi.master_issue_id=pi.project_id,true,false) as isMaster, pi.master_issue_id as masterIssueId, pi.project_id as projectId , pi.real_name as realName , pi.amount FROM tb_repayment_proj_plan pp LEFT JOIN tb_tuandai_project_info pi ON pi.project_id = pp.project_id WHERE pp.business_id = #{businessId} ORDER BY pp.amount DESC
